== MainInclusionReportSmartdimmer ==

== Main inclusion report for smartdimmer ==

=== Requirements ===

1. ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/s/smartdimmer

2. ''Rationale:'' Some Sonys provide no mechanism for altering screen brightness other than talking to the graphics chipset directly. smartdimmer does this.

3. ''Security:'' No known issues. Must be run as root.

4. ''QA:'' Intended to be run from acpi-support scripts

5. ''Standards compliance:'' Debhelpered package

6. ''Dependencies:'' None

=== Reviewers ===
MartinPitt: approved
